Sports and Clubs: Member, Constitution Club, Delhi and Member of Adarsh Sports Club, Mumbai
Social And Cultural Activities: (i) Awareness for AIDS and drug abuse; (ii) Organize State level tournaments for various sports viz., cricket, kabaddi, etc.; (iii)District level competitions held for dance drama, singing, etc. (iv) To promote cultural interest through my Trust; (v) Free medical camps viz., cataract operations, free distribution of spectacles, blood donation, complete health check-up free of cost; and (vi) Actively pursuing the cost of propogating free job oriented computer education to economically under-privileged children.
Special Interests: (i) To provide high quality education (100% literacy) amongst slum and under-privileged children; and (ii) To create awareness on cleanliness and personal hygiene amongst the under-privileged children.
Other Information: (i) Worked with the riot affected families during the Mumbai roits by providing relief; and (ii) Giving shelter and basic amenities to the families affected by flood in Mumbai (2005-Deluge)
